title: My Account
body:
My main League of Legends account was permanently suspended for unauthorized third-party programs, but it was not me using these third party programs as my account was compromised about 4 months ago while i was not playing League so i could not do anything to stop it. I stopped playing League around June 2015 and my account got compromised without my knowledge during November 2015 - January 2016 as match history shows.

My question here is, is there any hope at all to retrieve my account?? as quiet a lot of time has been spent on it and its really unlucky i guess for this to happen. :(

I have already submitted a few support tickets but is it still worth trying or is all hope lost for me?

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm unable to comment on whether or not you have a chance at being unbanned as I'm not sure myself.

Your best bet (Which it sounds like you've already done) is to submit a support ticket and have Player Support look into the case for you.

Thanks for replying.  Judging by what the support members have been telling me, I  dont think they believe what i am saying and refuse to see the issue from my perspective. I dont know what to do anymore, but i know that its definitely worth the time it will take to try and get my account back, if there is a chance at least.
Can you reply with your ticket number? I'll see if I can't get some more info.

#21879132 My first Ticket
#21951375 My second Ticket

Hey,

Seph is out atm but after asking around the NA volunteers for some help I have an answer for you.

Previously compromised accounts can be tricky, so what I need you to do is submit a fresh ticket with both of those ticket numbers included in the message. Explain your situation but keep it short (the rest of the info should be in the other tickets) and that should get you on the right track to finding a resolution.

Good luck :)
Ok thank you very much i will try this. :)
Hey Daniel, I just wanted to follow up with you to see if the issue has been resolved! Let me know!
